title: Insubordinate conduct toward warrant officer, noncommissioned officer, or petty officer
context: [ยง124A-126] Insubordinate conduct toward warrant officer, noncommissioned officer, or petty officer. Any warrant officer or enlisted member who: (1) Strikes or assaults a warrant officer, noncommissioned officer or petty officer, while that officer is in the execution of the officer&rsquo;s office; (2) Wilfully disobeys the lawful order of a warrant officer, noncommissioned officer, or petty officer; or (3) Treats with contempt or is disrespectful in language or deportment toward a warrant officer, noncommissioned officer, or petty officer, while that officer is in the execution of the officer&rsquo;s office; shall be punished as a court-martial may direct. [L 1982, c 171, pt of ยง2; gen ch 1985]
